survey_name: Health and Wellness App User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of health and wellness apps to understand their satisfaction levels, feature preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which health and wellness app do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture apps not listed. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly for easy selection.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a dropdown menu for this question to save space and improve user experience.

script.question_text: Which health and wellness app do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary health and wellness app?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.
questions.scripter_notes: Implement as radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary health and wellness app?

questions.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently in your health and wellness app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all relevant features. Ensure the 'Other' option includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Implement as checkboxes for multi-choice selection.

script.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently in your health and wellness app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your health and wellness app?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather detailed feedback. Keep the text box large enough for comprehensive responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Implement as a text area for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your health and wellness app?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your health and wellness app to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: This is a Net Promoter Score (NPS) question. Ensure the scale is clear and consistent.
questions.scripter_notes: Implement as radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your health and wellness app to a friend or colleague?
